thread.title: Volunteer fundraiser will have X Factor
thread.title_full: Volunteer fundraiser will have X Factor

title: Volunteer fundraiser will have X Factor
text:
Volunteer fundraiser will have X Factor 22nd Oct 2015 2:01 PM Don’t miss X Factor star Justin Standley at the special GDSC Melbourne Cup fundraiser in November. Popular Stories Local Real Estate Subscribe Now 
THE Grafton District Services Club is set for a day of fantastic Melbourne Cup entertainment this year with a fundraising luncheon for Grafton Volunteer Support Group for Westpac Life Saver Rescue Helicopter, featuring a live performance by X Factor finalist Justin Standley. 
Standley has shot to national prominence following his success as a finalist on the popular reality program, this year alone gaining two top 10 country hits in the Country Tracks Chart Top 40. 
As well as receiving numerous awards for his talents singing, Justin has also been recognised formally for his outstanding songwriting abilities winning the AORA/TSA New Songwriter Award this year. 
He lives his passion by teaching songwriting and music in remote areas of Queensland and running choir workshops for country choirs across NSW. Justin will no doubt warm hearts and bring smiles to faces in Grafton this Melbourne Cup. 
Of course a day like this wouldn't be complete without all the marvellous race trimmings including a glass of bubbles on arrival, canapés and a delicious two-course lunch. Be sure to don your best race outfit as there will be prizes for best dressed lady, best dressed man and best hat or fascinator. There will also be raffles, lucky door prizes and sweeps with all the action live from Flemington. 
All the fun on November 3 will start from noon, tickets are just $35, with bookings of 10 or more receiving the 10th person free. fundraiser
